name: Heating preset mode 'away'
info: Set the heating preset mode to 'away' **ONLY** if the heating system is on.

name: Heating preset mode 'Schedule'
info: Set the heating preset mode to 'schedule' **ONLY** if the heating system is on.

name: Slack notification
info:
# Send slack notification
Send slack message and video / image if present.

It reads `msg.notification` data for the following fields:

`header`: `<optional>` Message header. The header will be followed by a divider block.

`message`: `<mandatory>` The message to send.

`type`: `<optional>` Notification type.

`place`: `<optional>` Notification place.

`image`: `<optional>` Accessory image to use in the notification.

`file_path`: `<optional>` The location of the file to upload to slack (usually a video or photo).

name: Convert minutes to milis
func:
msg.delay = msg.minutes * 60 * 1000;
return msg;

name: Convert minutes to hours and minutes
Build telegram Message
template: { "message": " Activado modo invitado durante {{ hours }} hora(s) y {{ minutes }} minutos"}

name: Trigger alarm when office motion detected?
Trigger alarm when laundry door open?
Trigger alarm when kitchen door open?
Trigger alarm when kitchen blind open?
Trigger alarm when hall motion detected?
Trigger alarm when swimming pool motion detected?
Trigger alarm when bbq motion detected?
Trigger alarm when garden shed motion detected?
Trigger alarm when main entrance motion detected?
Trigger alarm when living room motion detected?
New video or image in FTP
Set event data for hall camera
func:
msg.event = {}
msg.event.event_type = "CAMERA_MOTION_DETECTED"
msg.event.event_type_description = "Movimiento detectado"
msg.event.detection_entity_id = "switch.recibidor_camara_det_mov"
msg.event.message = ":alarm-bell: Movimiento detectado en el recibidor"
msg.event.location = "Recibidor"
msg.event.entity_id = "camera.recibidor"
msg.event.file_path = msg.payload.event.path
return msg;
